card.description: Whether as an exercise in creativity or a test to solve for real-life, I love to push boundaries and explore. Here’s a glimpse of work I’ve done in the past.

header.title: Overview
text: Whether as an exercise in creativity or a test to solve for real-life, I love to push boundaries and explore. I frequently create specific challenges for myself. Some of my constraints might include a time limit, which pushes me to work efficiently under pressure, ideate and iterate faster, and design for the sake of an inhibited creative process. On other occasions I focus less on visual output and refinement and more on research, idea generation, and complex problem-solving.

_meta.title: Greyson MacAlpine — Concept Projects
_meta.description: The Pilot app is a translation application that corresponds with its smart wearables counterpart developed by Waverly Labs, a consumer electronics company. They use the latest technologies in machine translation and speech recognition for their flagship product to allow wearers to speak different languages while clearly understanding each other.
